testcase.name: The old password should not be used
testcase.skipped: Given Go to given URL.......................................................undefined When User login.............................................................undefined And Click Account Menu......................................................undefined And Select Password button..................................................undefined And See Password Edit Form..................................................undefined And Enter the "Beck11"......................................................undefined And Enter a "NewPs1*".......................................................undefined And Verify "fifth level bar" is displayed...................................undefined <testsuite errors="0" failures="0" name="io.cucumber.core.plugin.JUnitFormatter" skipped="1" tests="1" time="0.171"> <testcase classname="An Employee can manage Customer" name="TC01 All customers should show up on manage customers module populating the account information of the customer "First Name Last Name Middle Initial Email Mobile Phone Number Phone Number Address Create Date "" time="0.048"> <skipped><![CDATA[Given user is on manage customer page.......................................undefined And get the web table header................................................undefined Then verify the table header contains "First Name" "Last Name" "Middle Initial" "Email" "Mobile Phone Number" "Phone Number" "Address" "Create Date".undefined
